thread.title: Riddle, Joy
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Riddle, Joy

author: Riddle, Joy
title: Riddle, Joy
text: Booking with them is an easy, enjoyable experience with no worries of what you will walk into when you arrive at the rental. We booked over the summer because they were pet friendly and very reasonably priced. We were pleasantly surprised at the level of service that came after booking. We were sent a link to download an app specific to our unit with helpful information and suggestions about the rental and the surrounding area. They checked on us a few times via email during our stay and the rental was well furnished and very clean. As a result we didn't look with any other company for booking our upcoming trips.
